features: Slim fit sits close to the body, with room for the garment to move with you
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
Gore-Tex Infinium™ fabric is designed for when comfort and performance take priority over waterproofness
Windproof, durable and highly water-resistant with great breathability and flexibility
Interior storm flap features fabric behind the zipper to keep out the wind
Interior sling straps to carry jacket
Pocket key clip and media port
Offers breathability for medium-intensity activities with moderate sweat management for quick-drying comfort with the durability of a Gore-Tex membrane for reliable weatherproofing
Zip vents enhance breathability during more intense activity and in warmer conditions
Drop hem for extended length and added coverage
Mesh stash pocket with stretch binding at opening, removable bag with sling attachment, zippered chest pocket, and zippered hand-warmer pockets
